#### Survival likelihood contributions, assuming non-informative censoring

$$
\ba
\p(Y=y,D=d) 
&= [\pdf_T(y)]^{d} [\surv_T(y)]^{1-d}
\\
&= [\haz_T(y)]^{d} [\surv_T(y)]
\ea
$$

$$\haz(t|x) = \haz_0(t)\theta(\vx)$$
